paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Importantly, iPSC-CMs derived from the severely affected LQT2 patients displayed prolonged action potentials compared with cells from mildly affected first-degree relatives.
Importantly, iPSC-CMs derived from the severely affected LQT2 patients displayed prolonged action potentials compared with cells from mildly affected first-degree relatives.

functional_data.summary: iPSC-CMs from patients with the hERG R752W mutation displayed lower IKr amplitude.

variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the variable expressivity of the KCNH2 mutation.
key_quotes: iPSC-CMs derived from all patients with hERG R752W mutation displayed lower IKr amplitude.
iPSC-CMs from severely affected mutation-positive individuals exhibited greater L-type Ca2+ current.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant was successfully extracted.
